channel.title: Few Questions
channel.description:
New at coding a 639, so i have a few questions..
I'm using the Torvapkz 637 pk server, and it starts instant 138, how do i change it to were they can't have instant 138, just removing summoning from them so they are at 126.
Second question, How would i add objects, and add the command ::dice or add a gambler that gambles items..
Sorry if this is too much i'm very new to this kind of server.
